channel.title: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades"

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded:
Darts was added August 26th.

CDs and Razor Blades are used during Darts play. Hence, the extra CDs on Emo 3 ( with two news announcements mentioning a higher drop rate, if you look at the news archive ) and the Razor Blades ( though not mentioned in the announcements ) are both related to this upgrade.

We don't need much more discussion on this subject, really.

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded: Yea Razor Blades are dropped from emosuke Lv.3 I have been getting them for awhile now.

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded:
And he even drops CD's like hell
Got about 75 today

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded:
he drops them yes. but a few weeks ago, he didnt drop any of them
must have been changed

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded:
2 days of missions with him, and i got like 12 razor blades so far, so he definitely drops them

Errtu
Champions Village

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded: Uh yea i just got a razor blade from emosuke lv.3 with my alt character. I had billy lv.3 and emosuke lv.3 in my team. It says "emo coughs up a â€¦ Razor Blade?! Total number: 1 Warning not a solution to being emo. Has this happened to anyone else?

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded: Razor Blades removed from Emosuke's wiki page.

item.title: Re: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded: agony of defeat jutsu did not let him drop blades

item.title: Emo lvl 3 and Razor Blades
item.content:encoded: Hey, the site says that Emo lvl 3 drops Razor Blades. I've had him in my team on three characters for a couple of weeks now and not a single razor blade dropped. I would say that he no longer drops them when he's levelled lvl. 3. Anyone disagree?
